options.text: Prior to deployment, make sure you meet the prerequisites outlined in the resource pre-reqs section in Zero Trust Image solution documentation.

elements.name: resourceGroup
elements.label: Existing resource group
elements.toolTip: Select the name of the existing resource group where the image will be created. Recommended to use the same resource group where the compute gallery resides.

elements.name: type
elements.label: Type of image
elements.toolTip: Select the desired Azure service for the source image.

elements.name: offer
elements.label: Offer
elements.toolTip: Select the desired marketplace image offer.

elements.name: sku
elements.label: SKU
elements.toolTip: Select the desired marketplace image SKU.

elements.name: imageDefinition
elements.label: Image Definition
elements.toolTip: Select the desired image definition.

elements.name: computeGalleryName
elements.label: Compute gallery name
elements.toolTip: Inpute the name for the Compute Gallery.

validations.message: The value must be between 1 - 80 characters. The value may only contain alphanumerics, periods, and underscores. The value must start and end with an alphanumeric.

elements.name: replicaCount
elements.label: Replica count
elements.toolTip: Regional replica count which specifies the number of replicas you want to create per region

elements.name: excludeFromLatest
elements.label: Exclude from latest
elements.toolTip: Determines whether the image version will be the latest available version.

elements.name: majorVersion
elements.label: Image Major Version. The minor and patch versions will be auto generated.
elements.toolTip: Pick the size in MB

elements.name: minorVersion
elements.label: Image Patch Version. The minor version will be auto generated.
elements.toolTip: Pick the size in MB

elements.name: container
elements.label: Container
elements.toolTip: Select an existing container.

elements.name: userAssignedIdentityName
elements.label: User assigned identity name
elements.toolTip: Input the name for the User Assigned Identity.

validations.message: The value must be between 2 - 127 characters. The value may only contain alphanumerics, hyphens, and underscores. The value must start with an alphanumeric.

elements.name: virtualNetwork
elements.label: Virtual Network
elements.toolTip: Select an existing virtual network for image capture.

constraints.allowedValues: [map(filter(steps('virtualMachines').network.virtualNetworksApi.value, (item) => equals(item.location, steps('basics').scope.location.name)), (item) => parse(concat('{"label":"', item.name, '","description":"Resource group: ', first(skip(split(item.id, '/'), 4)), '","value":"', item.id, '"}')))]

elements.name: subnet
elements.label: Subnet
elements.toolTip: Select an existing subnet for the image capture.

elements.name: vmSize
elements.label: Virtual machine size
elements.toolTip: Select the virtual machine

elements.name: username
elements.label: Username
elements.toolTip: Input the username for the local administrator account.

elements.name: password
elements.toolTip: Input the password for the local administrator account.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be within 12 to 123 characters, be alphanumeric, and include 1 lower case character, 1 upper case character, 1 number, and 1 special character that is not '\' or '-'.

elements.name: hybridUseBenefit
elements.label: Enable hybrid use benefit
elements.toolTip: Enables the hybrid use benefit to reduce the cost of Azure virutal machines when the appropriate licensing and software assurance has been purchased.

elements.name: exemption
elements.ariaLabel: Enter the policy IDs to exempt to prevent virtual machine extensions on the imaging virtual machines.
elements.label: Policy Exemptions

columns.header: Policy Assignment Resource IDs for Exemption

elements.name: customSoftware
elements.label: customSoftware
elements.toolTip: Select True to add custom software to the image

elements.label: Install Office
elements.toolTip: Select True to install Office

elements.toolTip: Select office blob
elements.label: Office (.exe)

elements.label: InstallAccess

elements.label: Install One Dive For Business
elements.toolTip: Select True to Install One Dive For Business

elements.name: installOneNote
elements.label: Install OneNote
elements.toolTip: Select True to install OneNote

elements.name: installOutlook
elements.label: Install Outlook
elements.toolTip: Select True to install Outlook

elements.name: installPowerPoint
elements.label: Install PowerPoint
elements.toolTip: Select True to Install PowerPoint

elements.name: installProject
elements.label: Install Project
elements.toolTip: Select True to install Project

elements.name: installPublisher
elements.label: Install Publisher
elements.toolTip: Select True to install Publisher

elements.name: installSkypeForBusiness
elements.label: Install Skype For Business
elements.toolTip: Select True to install Skype For Business

elements.name: installVisio
elements.label: installVisio
elements.toolTip: Select True to install Visio

elements.name: installWord
elements.label: Install Word
elements.toolTip: Select True to install Word

elements.name: installTeams
elements.label: Install Teams
elements.toolTip: Select True to install Teams

elements.name: teamsBlob
elements.toolTip: Select teams blob
elements.label: Teams Installer (.msi)

elements.name: msrdcwebrtcsvcInstaller
elements.toolTip: Select Remote Desktop WebRTC Redirector Service
elements.label: Remote Desktop WebRTC Redirector Service Installer (.msi)

elements.name: vcRedistInstaller
elements.toolTip: Select Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable
elements.label: Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable Installer (.exe)

elements.name: installVirtualDesktopOptimizationTool
elements.label: Install Virtual Desktop OptimizationTool
elements.toolTip: Select True to install Virtual Desktop OptimizationTool

elements.name: vDotBlob
elements.toolTip: Select vDot blob
elements.label: VDOT Package (.zip)

elements.name: enable
elements.label: Enable Build Automation
elements.toolTip: Enables the automation of image builds using an Automation Account in a zero trust compliant configuration.

elements.name: automationAccount
elements.label: Automation account name
elements.toolTip: Input the name for the automation account.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 6 - 50 characters in length. The value must contain alphanumerics and hyphens, start with a letter, and end with an alphanumeric.

elements.name: keyVault
elements.label: Key vault name
elements.toolTip: Input the name for the key vault.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 3 - 24 characters in length. The value must contain alphanumerics and hyphens, start with a letter, and end with an alphanumeric.

elements.name: keyVaultPrivateDnsZone
elements.label: Existing key vault private DNS zone

elements.name: name
elements.label: Virtual machine name
elements.toolTip: Input a custom name for the virtual machine.

elements.name: domainJoin
elements.label: Domain Join
elements.toolTip: Enables the automation of image builds using an Automation Account in a zero trust compliant configuration.

elements.name: domainName
elements.label: Domain Name
elements.toolTip: Provide the domain name for Active Directory Domain Services.

elements.name: ouPath
elements.label: OU Path
elements.toolTip: Input the distinguished name of the desired organization unit for the AVD session hosts.

elements.name: domainJoinUserPrincipalName
elements.label: Domain join user principal name
elements.toolTip: Enter the user principal name with domain join privileges.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be a valid user principal name.

elements.name: domainJoinPassword
elements.toolTip: Enter a password that is alphanumeric, contains at least 12 characters, 1 letter, 1 number and 1 special character.

elements.name: enable
elements.label: Enable monitoring
elements.toolTip: Deploy the required resources to enable monitoring for the automation runbook.

elements.name: logAnalyticsWorkspace
elements.label: Existing Log Analytics Workspace for Security
elements.toolTip: Select the log analytics workspace used for collecting security data for Sentinel or Defender for Cloud. This is required to multihome the Microsoft Monitoring Agent.

elements.name: actionGroup
elements.label: Action Group
elements.toolTip: Input the name for the action group.

elements.name: distributionGroup
elements.label: Distribution group
elements.toolTip: Input the distribution group for receiving alerts on the build status.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be a valid email address.
